issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Incorporate new level generation logic in parquet write path with a flag to revert back to old logic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7741](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7741). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is likely going to be a decent amount of changes we should isolate them behind a feature flag.

comments.body:
